channel.title: Red Flare
channel.description: We are a group of anti-fascist investigators, using open source and investigative methods to expose and oppose the far right in Britain.

item.title: Neo-Nazis call for arson attacks on immigration-related charities
item.description: A far-right Telegram group with 13,000 members is sharing a list of 39 immigration-related charities, advice centres and solicitors as targets for arson attacks on Wednesday night.

item.title: Convicted neo-Nazi terrorist was at Southport riot
item.description: One of the far-right activists who travelled to Southport on Tuesday night was Matthew Hankinson, an unrepentant neo-Nazi terrorist, who was jailed for six years for his membership of the proscribed neo-Nazi youth group National Action.

item.description: Another split from Patriotic Alternative registers with the Electoral Commission

item.title: Anti-Khan Protest to Take Place in Newham During Palestine March
item.description: A protest against the London mayor has gone viral on social media.

item.title: Leading Patriotic Alternative Organiser Jailed for Two Years
item.description: Patriotic Alternative (PA)’s Yorkshire regional organiser Samuel Melia, has been jailed for two years today.

item.title: How Close to Neo-Nazi Terrorism is the New Fascist Homeland Party?
item.description: Despite Homeland’s efforts to distance themselves from PA’s more overt neo-Nazi politics, and their rejection of labels such as 'fascist' or 'far-right', some of the fledgling party’s founding members have emerged from a neo-Nazi milieu

item.title: Britain's Newest Fascist Party are Going Viral on TikTok
item.description: Homeland are reaching tens of thousands of people through the social media platform

item.title: Far-Right Intent on Violence Following Inflammatory Statements by Leading Politicians
item.description: We have seen messages in which far-right activists discuss attacking pro-Palestinian protestors, anti-fascists and ethnic minorities.

item.title: Key Organiser in Homeland Party had Three Shotguns Seized by Police
item.description: Anthony Burrows recently lost an appeal to have his shotgun certificate reinstated.

item.title: Neo-Nazi Streamer and Patriotic Alternative activist “Yuro” Exposed as Stefan Rutland
item.description: Red Flare can reveal the identity of “Yuro” - a founding host of the now-defunct, virulently racist neo-Nazi podcast, The Absolute State of Britain (TASOB), and a key figure in fascist party Patriotic Alternative (PA) - as Stefan Kelvin Rutland, originally from South London and now living in Anglesey, North Wales.

item.title: Neo-Nazi Homeland Party Fall Out With Cannock Anti-Migrant Protestors
item.description: Following our exposés last week, the neo-Nazi Homeland Party have been asked to leave the anti-migrant campaign in Cannock, Staffordshire by local residents and the council candidate they had been supporting.
